summary: Makes the embalming tool playable, item requested by Unendingfear
descriptionHtml:
Makes the embalming tool playable, item requested by Unendingfear

Installation:

Copy meshes folder & SCALPEL.esp to your Skyrim\\data directory.

The folder-structure should look like:
... Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\weapons\\SCALPEL\\ ALL NIF FILES
... Skyrim\\data\\SCALPEL.esp

Make sure that the plugin is activated in startmenu | DATA FILES.
The scalpel is placed in the forge-menu along with the Daedric-items.

No Daedric Smithing Skill? Open console (key ^) and enter HELP SCALPEL 4
You get a code XX000D63 and enter PLAYER.ADDITEM XX000D63 1
(XX = loadnumber of the mod - may differ and the 1 I added = amount)

Damage should scale with your skills/lvl, if you want to adjust the dmg open the Creation Kit, 
load, check SKYRIM.ESM and SCALPEL.ESP in the left window, set SCALPEL.ESP to ACTIVE FILE and 
press OK. In the object window check ITEMS and WEAPONS, search for SCALPEL and open it, change 
the dmg/speed values in this window, press OK and SAVE.

greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
